name: Follow Your Dreams
description:
Follow your dreams - JUST DO IT! :) The Slavic Game Jam Best Quality Game finally here!
Great soundtrack made by our sound man - Artur Szczęch - https://soundcloud.com/artur-futerko
And great art made by our great artist - Małgorzata Sinius

Neat level design by Adrian Jabłonka

And also highest quality code by Tomasz Przysiwek, Maciej Walaszczyk and Grzegorz Kiernozek
